parameters.name: Bucket
parameters.description: The bucket in which the data cache is stored. Default value: default.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate a token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure the idempotence](~~25693~~).

parameters.name: DataSource
parameters.description: The information about the data source.

parameters.name: EipCreateParam
parameters.description: The elastic IP address (EIP) to be created and associated. If no NAT gateway is configured for the virtual private cloud (VPC), you can associate an EIP to pull data from the Internet.

parameters.name: EipInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the elastic IP address (EIP). If no NAT gateway is configured for the virtual private cloud (VPC), you can bind an EIP to the elastic container instance to pull data from the Internet.

parameters.name: RetentionDays
parameters.description: The retention period for the data cache. The data cache is deleted after the retention period expires. By default, the data cache does not expire.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the security group.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the data cache.
